org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.task.utils

Class ForkerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.task.utils.ForkerUtils

  • public final class ForkerUtils
extends Object
    ForkerUtils is a helper to cache OSBuilder factory and provide some helping methods to launcher and executable.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 2.2

      • checkConfigAndGetUser

        public org.objectweb.proactive.extensions.processbuilder.OSUser checkConfigAndGetUser(TaskContext taskContext)
                                                                               throws IllegalAccessException,
                                                                                      KeyException
        If the process must be run under a specific user, check the configuration of '"pas.launcher.forkas.method"' property and proceed as follow:
        • if "pas.launcher.forkas.method"=none : throws IllegalAccessException
        • if "pas.launcher.forkas.method"=pwd : return the user using its login and password
        • if "pas.launcher.forkas.method"=key : return the user using its ssh key
        Parameters:
        taskContext - the task context.
        Returns:
        the OSUser to be passed to the OSPRocess if node fork method is configured.
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - if the node configuration method is not compatible with incoming credentials
        KeyException - decryption failure, malformed data
        IllegalArgumentException - if decrypter is null
        IllegalAccessException - if node fork method is not set

      • setSharedExecutablePermissions

        public void setSharedExecutablePermissions(File file)

      • setSharedPermissions

        public void setSharedPermissions(File file)
